Detailed Description

a very simple user interface from shell

ROS Node Name
  • user_interface
Authors
Carmine Tommaso Recchiuto
Version
v1.0

Description:

When the simulation is started, the console asks to press '1' to start the motion of the robot, and to press '0' for stopping the motion. This is the interface this node provides to the user. The node interacts with the node state_machine.cpp : when the user sends '1', the command "start" is sent to the state_machine.cpp node. "stop" is sent when the user presses any other key different from '1'.

There's no error handling. Just a simple implementation.

Clients:

  • /user_interface : Command.srv
    see the service state_machine.cpp
